attributes.action: Make immigrants seek refuge in the first safe country they reach.
attributes.additional_details: I would like Parliament to raise is as communities across Britain are being destroyed and our culture also, none of us asking asking for this, it’s being forced upon us.
attributes.background: I would like information as to why immigrants refuse to seek safety or refuge in the first safe country they reach, yet they risk their lives across Europe then across the channel to Britain, it’s not about safety it seems to be about benefits.

rejection.details:
This issue is covered by existing petitions: 

Only grant asylum to citizens of immediate neighbouring countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724525

Do not house illegal migrants in private rentals, deport them immediately
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726409
